property.name: buttonLabelString
property.label: Button labels
property.description: Enter a comma-separated list of labels for the buttons. They will appear in the same order on screen.

property.name: buttonColourString
property.label: Button colours
property.description: Enter a comma-separated list of colours for the buttons from the following list: 'grey' (default), 'red', 'blue', 'green'. They must match the order of the labels above. E.g. 'red, blue'

property.name: includeLine
property.label: Include horizontal line above buttons
property.description: Check the box to include a horizontal line above the buttons, giving separation between the buttons and the element above them

property.name: selectedValue
property.label: Selected Value
property.description: Value that holds the label of the button that's clicked, pass this to a Decision block to route the Flow
